description: Feeling nothing, protecting from everything. Let's gently reconnect.

art.title: Feeling Color Exploration
art.instruction: Experiment with colors that might represent buried feelings. Let colors speak before words.
art.affirmation: I gently explore feeling through color and creative expression

art.title: Numbness Thaw Art
art.instruction: Draw frozen landscape slowly thawing into spring - representing gentle emotional thawing.
art.affirmation: I thaw gently from numbness into renewed feeling

art.title: Safe Feeling Art
art.instruction: Create art in the safest way possible - gentle colors, simple shapes. Ease back into feeling.
art.affirmation: I return to feeling in the safest, gentlest way possible

breathwork.title: Gentle Awakening Breath
breathwork.instruction: Breathe very gently, inviting feeling back without force or pressure.
breathwork.affirmation: I gently invite feeling back into my life without pressure

breathwork.title: Body Reconnection Breath
breathwork.instruction: Breathe into different parts of your body, gently reconnecting with physical sensation.
breathwork.affirmation: I gently reconnect with my body and its natural capacity to feel

somatic.title: Gentle Sensation Awakening
somatic.instruction: Touch different textures, temperatures gently. Awaken sensation without overwhelming.
somatic.affirmation: I gently awaken my capacity to feel sensation and emotion

somatic.title: Safe Feeling Poses
somatic.instruction: Hold comfortable positions and breathe, gently inviting body back into feeling.
somatic.affirmation: I create safety for feeling to return naturally

cbt.title: Numbness Protection Analysis
cbt.instruction: Understand numbness as protection. What was it protecting you from?
cbt.affirmation: I understand numbness's protection and gently create safety for feeling

rebt.title: Feeling Demand Challenge
rebt.instruction: Don't demand immediate feeling return. Allow natural thawing process.
rebt.affirmation: I allow feeling to return naturally without demanding or forcing

neural.title: Safe Feeling Installation
neural.instruction: Install the knowing that it's safe to feel, at your own pace and timing.
neural.affirmation: It is safe for me to feel, and I trust my natural timing

neural.title: Gentle Thaw Programming
neural.instruction: Program gentle, safe return to feeling without overwhelming your system.
neural.affirmation: I thaw from numbness gently and safely, at my perfect pace

journaling.title: Numbness Appreciation Journal
journaling.instruction: Write appreciation for numbness's protection while setting intention for gentle thawing.
journaling.affirmation: I appreciate numbness's protection and invite gentle return to feeling

journaling.title: Safe Feeling Invitation
journaling.instruction: Write gentle invitation to feelings to return when they feel safe to do so.
journaling.affirmation: I create safety for feelings to return at their own perfect pace

eft.title: Numbness Appreciation Tapping
eft.instruction: Tap: 'Even though I feel numb, I appreciate this protection and invite gentle awakening when ready.'
eft.affirmation: I appreciate numbness's protection and invite gentle emotional awakening

eft.title: Safe Feeling Tapping
eft.instruction: Tap: 'It's safe for me to feel, at my own pace, in my own time, in my own way.'
eft.affirmation: It is completely safe for me to feel at my own perfect pace

emdr.title: Safe Feeling Memory Installation
emdr.instruction: Install memories of times feeling was safe and welcomed through bilateral stimulation.
emdr.affirmation: I carry memories of safe feeling and trust in emotional safety

emdr.title: Gentle Awakening Processing
emdr.instruction: Use bilateral movements to support gentle awakening from numbness.
emdr.affirmation: I support my gentle awakening from numbness with patience and care

yoga.title: Gentle Awakening Flow
yoga.instruction: Very gentle movements to slowly awaken body and feeling without overwhelming.
yoga.affirmation: I gently awaken my body and emotions through mindful movement

yoga.title: Supported Feeling Poses
yoga.instruction: Use props to feel completely supported while gently inviting emotion back.
yoga.affirmation: I feel completely supported as I gently reconnect with my emotions
